solution_line_template: Her fruiting plant count is {initial_flowering_plants} x {multiplier_fruiting} = <<{initial_flowering_plants}*{multiplier_fruiting}={initial_fruiting_plants}>>{initial_fruiting_plants}.

On Saturday, her flowering plant count is {initial_flowering_plants} + {bought_flowering_saturday} = <<{initial_flowering_plants}+{bought_flowering_saturday}={flowering_after_saturday}>>{flowering_after_saturday}.

On Saturday, her fruiting plant count is {initial_fruiting_plants} + {bought_fruiting_saturday} = <<{initial_fruiting_plants}+{bought_fruiting_saturday}={fruiting_after_saturday}>>{fruiting_after_saturday}.

On Sunday, her flowering plant count is {flowering_after_saturday} - {given_away_flowering_sunday} = <<{flowering_after_saturday}-{given_away_flowering_sunday}={flowering_after_sunday}>>{flowering_after_sunday}.

On Sunday, her fruiting plant count is {fruiting_after_saturday} - {given_away_fruiting_sunday} = <<{fruiting_after_saturday}-{given_away_fruiting_sunday}={fruiting_after_sunday}>>{fruiting_after_sunday}.

Roxy's remaining plant count in her garden is {flowering_after_sunday} + {fruiting_after_sunday} = <<{flowering_after_sunday}+{fruiting_after_sunday}={total_remaining_plants}>>{total_remaining_plants}.
